name: RDY Spring Break Camps
description: Available during SFUSD Spring Break, The Richmond District YMCA is hosting a variety of youth development camps. For TK to 5th grade youth, come explore our YTykes, traditional, sports, and cooking camp programs! -Non-Member Fee: $400 -YMCA Member $360 Includes a $50 non-refundable deposit with the balance owed 2 weeks before the start date of the program."
fullDescription: Available during SFUSD Spring Break, The Richmond District YMCA is hosting a variety of youth development camps. For TK to 5th grade youth, come explore our YTykes, traditional, sports, and cooking camp programs! -Non-Member Fee: $400 -YMCA Member $360 Includes a $50 non-refundable deposit with the balance owed 2 weeks before the start date of the program."
whatTheyOffer: Available during SFUSD Spring Break, The Richmond District YMCA is hosting a variety of youth development camps. For TK to 5th grade youth, come explore our YTykes, traditional, sports, and cooking camp programs! -Non-Member Fee: $400 -YMCA Member $360 Includes a $50 non-refundable deposit with the balance owed 2 weeks before the start date of the program."
howToGetIt: 2025 available from 3/31 - 4/04 Register through the YMCA membership portal and filter your search with the key phrase "Richmond - Spring Camp 2025". From there you'll see all four camp options - click the one you want for your youth and fill out the requested info.
agency: YMCA of San Francisco - Richmond District
